posts.post_content:
All three have tape on the back as seen in the scans.  The tape was lifted a bit on the edges of the Portrait and Dark Cap and paper has adhered to the tape.  The White Cap doesn't have any disturbance to the tape.  Removing the tape on these is beyond my expertise.

Both the "cap" versions are extremely presentable.  Great color and register; no creases.  Flaws of the portrait can be seen on the scan.

Price includes delivery.  Standard/regular paypal preferred.  Priced as singles:
Portrait: SOLD
Dark Cap: SOLD
White Cap: SOLD

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/mattyF/web.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/mattyB/web.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take the Matty Dark cap.  Thanks!

If the white cap is still available, I'll take it.

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
